about_the_game:
Phobos Subhuman is a gripping action-adventure game that blends intense combat, mystery, and horror. Follow the journey of an astronaut's daughter as she unravels the truth behind her father's disappearance in the year 2047, in the futuristic city of Athens. Immerse yourself in this story-rich experience and uncover secrets that will challenge the foundations of modern society.

2026...

A group of astronauts embarked on the first manned mission to Mars, but something went wrong. They disappeared without a trace on the small moon of Phobos, one of Mars' two satellites. The only witness to their disappearance is the all-powerful A.I. known as G.O.D. (Growth Operations Defence).

2047...

In a world plagued by war, famine, and radioactivity, the daughter of one of the missing astronauts is determined to uncover the truth behind their disappearance. She will dive deep into the mysteries of the Martian moon and unravel secrets that could change the future of humanity forever.

Key Features

  • Highly realistic 3D environments and characters
  • Immersive, tense and mysterious atmosphere
  • Brutal hand-to-hand, melee and ranged combat system
  • Unique plot based on astronomical and historical indications
  • Variety of both post-apocalyptic and Sci-Fi sceneries
  • Diverse and challenging enemies with unique abilities
  • Story-rich experience with unexpected twists and turns



Discover the city of Athens like never before in Phobos Subhuman. Explore a futuristic version of this historical city, complete with urban designs based on reality but with added futuristic elements. Take a tour of the city's slums, abandoned and in ruins, showcasing the poverty of the area.

Get ready, Phobos Subhuman is launching soon on Kickstarter! Make sure you follow us to stay up-to-date and be a part of this exciting journey.

Will you dare to challenge powers beyond your skill and your comprehension?

name: Phobos - Subhuman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 3 GB or AMD Radeon™ equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: For a better experience SSD is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel™ Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon™ equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: For a better experience SSD is recommended

pegi.descriptors: Blood, Violence, Psychological Horror, Crude Language

short_description: During the first manned mission to Mars, a group of astronauts land on the moon of Phobos, where they disappear without a trace. 20 years later the daughter of one of them, embarks on a quest to solve the mystery.
